amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 115-664 to make a series of technical and clarifying changes suggested by the Federal Trade Commission (FTC).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A001) without objection.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Goodlatte.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Goodlatte amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
